**Dividend Payment and Share Price Adjustment**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

set.seed(908)
library(webexercises)
library(knitr)

# Firm parameters
dividend_value <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 10, sd = 1), 2)  # dividend in millions
shares <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 15, sd = 1), 2)  # shares outstanding in millions
market_value <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 180, sd = 10), 2)  # market value in millions

# Price calculations
price_today <- round((market_value ) / shares, 2)  # Price before dividend
price_ex_dividend <- round((market_value- dividend_value) / shares, 2)  # Price after dividend

```

The firm has `r shares` million shares outstanding, and the market values it at `r market_value` million. The dividend to be paid is `r dividend_value` million. Calculate: (a) the price of Alpha Corp. today, assuming the dividend is paid out; and (b) the price of Alpha Corp. after the dividend is paid (ex-dividend price).
